# AB-100 Exam Preparation Workspace

This workspace is dedicated to preparing for the Microsoft AB-100: Agentic AI Business Solutions Architect certification exam.

## Workspace Purpose
- Comprehensive study materials for AB-100 exam
- Organized by exam domains (Plan, Design, Deploy)
- Practice resources and progress tracking
- Official Microsoft documentation links and resources

## Study Approach
- Follow the structured study plan in STUDY_PLAN.md
- Complete domain-specific guides in order
- Practice with scenarios and sample questions
- Track progress regularly using the tracking system

## Key Focus Areas
1. AI-powered business solutions planning (25-30%)
2. AI-powered business solutions design (25-30%)
3. AI-powered business solutions deployment (40-45%)

## Technologies Covered
- Microsoft 365 Copilot
- Microsoft Copilot Studio
- Azure AI Foundry
- Azure AI Services
- Azure OpenAI
- Dynamics 365 apps
- Microsoft Power Platform
- Agent orchestration and multi-agent systems
